title: Meet Nike N7 Ambassador Chris Wondolowski
description: Professional USMNT Soccer Star and leading goal scorer Chris Wondolowski from the Kiowa Nation is the definition of the underdog story.  As a Nike N7 Ambassador Chris wants to inspire youth to apply the same lessons you learn on the field, off the field.

asset.author: Nike
asset.hookText:
Professional USMNT Soccer Star and leading goal scorer Chris Wondolowski from the Kiowa Nation is the definition of the underdog story.  As a Nike N7 Ambassador Chris wants to inspire youth to apply the same lessons you learn on the field, off the field.  Find out how Chris hopes to move your generation.
 
Learn more at N7Fund.com
Shop the Nike N7 collection  http://gonike.me/ytN713
